Scripts.OnClick: local parent = self:GetParent() if parent.collapsed then parent:Collapse( false ) else parent:Collapse( true ) end PlaySound(54131)

if DiceMaster4.IsLeader( false ) then if button == "LeftButton" then self.State = self.State + 1; if self.State > 9 then self.State = 1 end elseif button == "RightButton" then self.State = self.State - 1; if self.State == 0 then self.State = 9 end end self:SetNormalTexture("Interface/TARGETINGFRAME/UI-RaidTargetingIcon_" .. self.State ) if self.State == 9 then self:SetNormalTexture(nil) end PlaySound(823) DiceMaster4.UpdateUnitFrames() end

Scripts.OnLoad: self:SetChecked(false) DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "Hidden", nil, nil, nil, "Your group cannot see this unit." )
Scripts.OnClick: if DiceMaster4.IsLeader( false ) then if self:GetChecked() then DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "Visible", nil, nil, nil, "Your group can see this unit." ) else DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "Hidden", nil, nil, nil, "Your group cannot see this unit." ) end PlaySound(905) self:GetScript("OnEnter")(self) DiceMaster4.UpdateUnitFrames() end
Scripts.OnUpdate: if DiceMaster4.IsLeader( false ) then self:Show() else self:Hide() end
Scripts.OnShow: if self:GetParent().highlight:IsShown() then self:GetParent().highlight:Hide() DiceMaster4.UnitFrameTargeted = nil; end

Scripts.OnLoad: self:SetFont("Fonts\\FRIZQT__.TTF", 10, nil) self:SetAutoFocus( false ) self:SetTextColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self:SetMaxLetters( 23 )

-- create buff buttons self:GetParent().buffs = {} for y = 0,2 do for x = 0,4 do local buff = CreateFrame( "Button", nil, self, "DiceMasterBuffButtonTemplate" ) buff:SetSize( 24, 24 ) buff:SetPoint( "TOPLEFT", 28*x+22, -35*y-10 ) buff:SetScript("OnLoad", DiceMaster4.UnitFrames_BuffButton_OnLoad); buff:SetScript("OnClick", DiceMaster4.UnitFrames_BuffButton_OnClick); table.insert( self:GetParent().buffs, buff ) buff.buffIndex = #self:GetParent().buffs end end
DiceMaster4.UnitFrame_Init( self ) self.name:SetText("Unit Name") self.visible = true self:Reset()
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if DiceMaster4.IsLeader( false ) then if IsShiftKeyDown() then if button=="LeftButton" then DiceMaster4.CreateUnitFrame() elseif button=="RightButton" then DiceMaster4.DeleteUnitFrame( self ) end return elseif IsControlKeyDown() then DiceMaster4.MarkUnitFrame( self ) return elseif button=="LeftButton" then DiceMaster4.AffixEditor_Open( self ) return end elseif DiceMaster4.IsLeader( true ) then if IsControlKeyDown() then DiceMaster4.MarkUnitFrame( self ) return end end if button=="LeftButton" then DiceMaster4.SelectUnitFrame( self ) end
Scripts.OnAnimFinished: if self.dead then self:SetAnimation(6) elseif self:IsShown() then self:SetAnimation(self.animation or 0) self:SetSpellVisualKit(self.spellvisualkit or 0) end
Scripts.OnUpdate: if self.collapsed then self:SetPortraitZoom(0) self:SetPortraitZoom(0.9) else self:SetPortraitZoom(0) self:SetPortraitZoom(0.6) end
